values: so i've pretty much become feed up with my life. no matter how hard i try things just arent making me happy. I should be making better choices with my life but i find myself sitting at home wondering what is the point to the sacrifice i make. I feel like my "friends" arent who i thought they are, and my real "friends" left me behind to continue their respective lives and i'm left in the dust because i cant follow down the same road they took. So here i sit in front of my computer screen drunk and having to go to work in 3 and a half hours while my "friends" are having a good time. dont get me wrong they have every right to have a good time and i in fact envy them but it just feels like as i'm leaving that once again i'm am being left behind. i'm starting to think that i should just do my own thing and forget the whole theory that is a "friend" because i will find myself in the same position night in and night out, left behind while everyone else is doing their own thing. in looking at my friends i envy them because they are their own group and even after the days, months and years i have spent hanging out with them i am not a part of that members only club. i dont know but waking up seems like a chore and the only reason i'm doing it is because i cant afford not to. whatever.
http://lorioncl66.livejournal.com/39171.html

so i had today off and i think it was both a blessing and a curse. a blessing because i was given the opportunity to take a test and take a big step in going back to college and moving on with my life. I even got all my laundry done, messed around on my bass, and sat back and reflect. well i didnt take my test and when you reflect on that things dont always seem good. I came to the conclusion that i'm almost 21 years old still not in school, hate my job, and am just not generally satisfied with my life. dont get me wrong i loved sitting at home and not having any thing i needed to attend to but in a way thats not good. also i need to get out of my house something fierce. i cant put up with stupidity anymore and my home is a breeding grounds for it. my job sucks some major ass. i cant stand this guy i work with, he makes me hate people and i dont trust him for shit. i am actually getting better hours and then all of a sudden i have to work late while a person that has been there less gets off before me. shes a fat bitch anyways so i guess i win in the end. venting on lj actually made me feel a little better. I'll take my damn test monday and we will see where it goes. i'm not contempt not being in school and the only upside is i have a job and am not completely wasting my life. anyways my rant is over and i'm off to end this day and start a new one.

so 2009 started off in some of the worst posible ways. someone STOLE my jacket and i-pod touch and you know how it goes no one grabbed it but somehow it just dissapeared. I cant join the marines due to have 4 too many concussions and a metal plate in my arm, so there goes my four year plan. and i am just sick and tired of everyone bitching about shit but not fixing it, they are just doing it for attention. also i'm done helping people out fuck them. i'm just done. i will be unreachable for the next month or so. not because i'm leaving i am just chosing to not talk to anybody for a while. i need to figure some shit out and i'm just done dealing with stupid bullshit involving the people around me. my best friends are all marines and now i cant join them and i'm left here with people that just bitch and bitch. so i'm just walking away from it all. I'll get back to you when i get my shit together.

so this is an actual update and not me ranting or bitching about something which is what live journal is used for way too much now a days. not saying anything bad about the people who do that because i for one am guilty i'm just saying that this update is an actual update about life for me and its not a rant. woo hoo go me. Anyways, i have offcially lost 21 pounds in about a month and only 15 more to go before January 5 and i can offcially DEP into the Marines. and then another 16 to go before March to actually ship off to recruit training. I would be lying if i said i wasnt looking forward to this. and on a different note some crazy black cracked out lady threatened to shoot me and then tried to hit me with the car that she was getting away in. Its kind of a long story but those details are the only important ones. Best part my partner that i was working with was like "ive been doing this job for 8 years and that is the first time someone threatened to shoot me." my response was as follows....."Welcome to Southfield." Till next time.
http://lorioncl66.livejournal.com/38395.html

So i recently made a decision to better my life and make the next step and all i have heard since then is "thats stupid" "or what a waste" in so many words. there has been like 4 people that have supported my decision to do this. I just dont understand its like people dont give a fuck when your there but the minute you make a decision that they dont like all of a sudden they are your best friend or they care the most about you. what the fuck is up with that. if i did the research and talked to people and i made an educated decision, then fuck off. i'm not that kind of person that plunges head first and thinks about the long term effects. i made sure that this will help me in the long run and i'm taking a big step in growing up and getting into my career. its not gunna be easy but nothing in life worth having comes easy. so for those of you that are reading this wondering what the hell i'm talking about here it is........
I'm joining the United States Marine Corps. There I said it.

so i've come to terms that in my line of work you have to not give a shit about other people and what they say. and i think that is why i've been in such a shitty mood for so long. i mean today i helped ruin a kids life because he was 17 and we prosecuted him. and i never felt bad for him. he was crying and the cop cuffed him and i was laughing the entire time. i've had people steal so they could feed their families and i honestly never gave a shit because i really dont care. has the world gone so far downhill that there are few honest people left in it? and its really bad when i cant trust some of the people i work with let alone know. take me back to the good old days before people were stabbing each other in the back just to better themselves. i'm talking about the times when money didnt really matter because i didnt have a need for it. the days where i could count on my friends to be there to hangout. i just have little hope for the future.

so i dont want this to be another shitty feeling post but damn. sometimes i wonder whats wrong with me. i'm never comtempt with what i have. i'll always want more. in a way its a good thing because it drives me to do everything that i can and not sit on my ass and do nothing. sometimes i wish i was one of those people that can sit there and not give a shit where their life is headed, or someone who has been given everything and never had to bust their ass for something nice in life. like how i should be contempt with being able to play almost any sport and being halfway decent at it or have more athletic ablity than that of the average person. i want to be able to play the guitar and have a different side of me than that of a jock. maybe its because i dont like the person that i am. i didnt think i was a bad person but i guess i was wrong. i dont really know anymore. fuck.

so latley i have been feeling kinda shitty. like everything is just falling apart. i'm second guessing myself and i just dont have that confidence that i used to have. i just dont know whats wrong with me. everything seem like a hassle i just dont get it. i'm not saying i was happy its just i feel like complete shit now. i'm trying not to show it because my problems are not important with what everyone else is dealing with and i dont want to dump my shit on someone else when they are having problems of their own. i'd rather help them out. its just waking up is hard to do. and going to work is damn near impossible. and i shouldnt feel that way work is going great. monday i was running the line by myself, and doing a great job at it, my managers love me and my hours are showing it. but i just cant bring myself to be a cook for the rest of my life. i dont know. till next time hopefully some better news. p.s i'm thinkg about gettinga tattoo its gunna look like this

so the last week or so has been kind of a bitch for me. work is work and i'm stepping into a "better" role which just means that i get to sit in the back and prep shit for people that cant do their fucking jobs and then leave and get shafted on the hours. then i was told our resturant was closing so i was kinda happy because that ment that i could go to another store and get away from the stigma of being the chef's kid but as of sunday we are still open so yee fucking haw. then the GM and Stan start praising this guy Mario who contrary to popular belife is not cool at all. this guy sits on his ass and texts on his phone while i'm running around busting my ass, its complete bullshit and then i get yelled at for having a bad attitude one day and get sent home WTF one day i was pissed and i get sent home. while everyone else can be pissy and nothing gets said to them thats bullshit. sometimes i hate my job but i love cooking. Joe is doing real good busting his ass and dealing with Mongo that piece of mexican shit that would rather pet lamps then work but whatever. oh and in other news my trans went on my car so now i need to find a new car because that is a total of 4,000$ of repairs that i need to make on my car so i am saying fuck that and looking to get a brand spanking new car. but the bright side was i drank like a fish last night and didnt get called into work today so i got to sleep off my hangover. well i'm done rambling and venting so Till next time.

Everyone has a crutch. What happens when that crutch finally fails? This is a question i was found asking myself today. The reason being is that I finally said "no" to my job about covering someone else's shift. As I thought about it I realized that I'm the crutch that my step-dad uses at work. They all know that if they needed someone to cover a shift or something needs to get done dump it on Bryan. Well that changed today, probably for the worse because my step-dad is pissed because he had to wash dishes. Now the shock wave starts where they have to find someone else to depend on. Its not just at work though, most of my friends or family even, know that when it comes down to it and they needed something done that they can count on me. Every time I have made that sacrifice and done whatever it was that was needed. So today I just snapped and realized that I need a break. The emotional burden was way too much for me to handle. I am normally known for being clutch, cool under pressure and dependable but not anymore. It has gotten me no where but walked all over. I cant be that guy anymore because I have no support to lean on. So now I feel like a failure and am really out of it. what the hell is wrong with me? Well I'm done complaining, just needed to get it off my chest. Till Next Time.

So i was sitting on my ass watching tv and someone said "nothing in this world worth having, comes easy" I thought to myself what have i actually worked hard for in my life. I just skated by in school never really applied myself, got into a good college and ended up dropping out. worked my ass off in football, never got a shot so i gave up. the one play i did the only reason i was good was because it called for me to be me. maybe that is why i have a feeling that i havent accomplished anything. it could be the reason i feel like shit and have little or no self confidence. and i realized that all the girls or relationships that i have ben involved with i end up quiting because it got too rough. I just dont think that i have ever made that extra attempt. well whatever. till next time.

So it's offical I have been here for an entire month. it doesnt seem like that long but then again i only have like 3 more months till the end of semister. my concussion is kinda going away. i still have really bad headaches and i am starting to not notice them because i have been dealing with them for a consistant week. my roomate is gone right now and i feel kinda lonely but i will eventually find something to do. its weird not haveing any friends here. miss you guys. oh and i will be home for the weekend of the 29th till the 31st so maybe i will see some of you.

i am not really sure how many people still read this thing but for those that are interested. i got my first concussion yesterday. needless to say it was in football. it was sweet. i got hit and i dont remember a lot of details. but i walked off the field and tried to act tough. then i fell over and the trainers came and helped me to go get checked out. now time for the scary part. while i was being checked out my neck started to hurt really bad. so i told sara (the trainer) and she told me to lay down. well to make a long story short they called the ambulance as a precaution and my neck was just sore from the whiplash. so right now i am just really sore and out of football for a couple of days i think. to those of you that read this thanks and dont worry i am ok. i think

So i only have two days left before i leave and it is really starting to get to me. i am leaving behind so many people to go to a place where i know no one. but i think it will turn out for the best. yesterday was tons' birthday party. it was fun. we played football and i was all time quaterback so i won no matter what. my weekend blew though. saturday i went to a grad party. the party was for a girl i have liked since about 7th or 8th grade but she never liked me. well needless to say i had a crappy time and i was the only one not drinking. i was sick of it any ways she kept sending me mixed messages. i just need to get away so i wont have to deal with that crap ever again.
